attributes.action: Create an inspiring vision for UK-2050
attributes.additional_details: We need the government to paint a clear, compelling and comprehensive road-map with 'north star goals' that will guide and direct all the government departments to transition towards a sustainable, carbon-neutral future full of opportunities for all. It will ensure we pay a fair and proportional price for all goods and services according to their value to society and use of rare /precious natural resources. Measures of success will include education attainment, full and meaningful employment opportunities and well-being for all rather than just GDP.
